entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TestNavigateToDifferentProjects is flaky #62286
  • Visual Basic Move Static Members: Refactoring one of multiple fields incorrectly formats whitespace #62283
  • Disabling Quick Info integration tests due to CI flakeyness. #62280
  • Revise SyntaxGenerator for file types #62274
  • Are `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Location` instances safe to cache in Incremental Source Generators? #62269
  • New rename UI shouldn't show "Include overload(s)" for locals/params/properties/fields #62267

Closed

  • Intermittent build failures with "error CS0104: `X` is an ambiguous reference between `System.X` and `System.X`" #60259
    17.3
  • IDE0040: Accessibility modifiers required should not be reported on file types #62259
    17.4
  • Severe ConditionalWeakTable contention observed on TryParseConversionOperatorDeclaration failure path #62238
    17.3
  • inconsistent back and forth rewrite of `SyntaxTree` and (plain) string sources #62276
  • Add option for diagnostics (squiggles/error list/etc.) to only check *visible* (not just *open*) files. #60652
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Use-site errors for unsupported ref fields #62296
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Walk green-nodes in incremental-generator attribute-finding path #62295
    Area-Compilers
  • Do not strip underscore if the result name will be invalid #62290
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Cache the hash in compilation options #62289
    Area-Compilers
  • Specify builder capacities in incremental generation to avoid wasted scratch arrays. #62285
    Area-Compilers
  • Always clear diagnostics when ending a debug session #62270
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Add public APIs for opened and closed event handling for non-source d… #62271
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Skip TestNavigateToDifferentProjects #62287
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62292
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #62291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62294
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62293
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Revert "Revert "Add Move Static Member To Existing Type (#61519)"" #62284
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Highlight the search term in the options page #61301
    Area-IDE, UX Review Complete, Next
  • Fix a race in CachingDictionary. #62248
    Area-Compilers
  • Disable flakey integration tests #62282
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Synch handlers with fix #62209
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove Skip-SymbolCheck suffix in insert.yml #62288
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix add accessibility for file types #62275
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Set capacity of builder to avoid expensive garbage. #62279
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to main #62262
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62278
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62277
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Expand "use null propagation" feature to support additional common cases. #62250
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Run the 'use null prop' analyzer/fixer on roslyn #62253
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62273
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62265
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62268
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62266
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow BatchNodes to reuse prior computed arrays if they would generate hte same value #62169
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Handle possible null symbols in `getAttributeTarget` #62137
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62264
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #62261
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Perform a lookahead rather than a parsing attempt in order to determine if current token starts a conversion operator declaration. #62240
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.3-vs-deps #62263
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Give an error when a file type is used in a global using static #62258
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62260
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/cache-artifacts #62299
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/use-azure-build-machines #62298
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #62297
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • File types IDE changes #62215
    Area-IDE
  • Make more command handlers synchronous #62086
    Area-IDE
  • Document Outline Feature #61784
    Area-IDE
  • changes needed to build Roslyn.sln on unix #61959
  • Give member refactoring tools consistent field selection #62102
    Area-IDE, Community
  • faster git checkout #62255
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #62225
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Issue/38102 #62226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • All incremental generator perf work #62159
    Area-Compilers
  • Delete some dead code in AbstractCreateServicesOnTextViewConnection #62256
    Area-IDE
  • Theme some dialogs #55971
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Theme The "Generate Overrides" Dialog #62244
    Area-IDE
  • Add more telemetry for rename #61370
    Area-IDE
  • Pool arrays in the incremental generator #62132
    Area-Compilers
  • Filter only valid symbols for inheritance completions #62013
    Area-IDE, Community
  • When we're removing the last project, fire SolutionRemoved #62257
    Area-IDE
  • Add ErrorFacts.IsBuildOnlyDiagnostic to ensure error list de-duping f… #62237
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Convert CSharpSyntaxGenerator to be an incremental generator #54379
    Area-Compilers
  • [WIP] improve test partitioning #62138
    Area-Infrastructure
